## Installing incidentCostingShiny

To install the development version from github:

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("n8thangreen/incidentCostingShiny")
```

Then, to load the package, use:
```{r eval=FALSE}
library(incidentCostingShiny)
```
